mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.title, ar.name AS artist, al.title AS album, s.lyric, s.duration, s.cover, s.mp3_url, s.flac_url, s.style, s.tags, s.listeners, s.permission, s.release_date, re.relate_time AS relateTime from song_own s JOIN artist ar ON s.artist_id = ar.id JOIN album al ON s.album_id = al.id JOIN relate re ON s.id = re.song_id WHERE re.playlist_id = #{id}

SELECT s.id, s.title, a.name AS artist, al.title AS album, s.lyric, s.duration, s.cover, s.mp3_url, s.flac_url, s.style, s.tags, s.listeners, s.permission, s.release_date from song_own s JOIN artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id JOIN album al ON s.album_id = al.id WHERE s.album_id = #{id}
